title: Access to PBE's needs
body:
I want to play pbe. 
can you tell me how to get pbe. THX{{champion:201}} {{summoner:6}}

replies.body: You can sign up for the PBE through this [link](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe).  I recommend checking our [PBE Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ) for informaiton on how PBE works and how selections are made.  Good l!ck!
But I have applied for a year or did not reply.{{item:3070}}
